channel.title: !~[1St Release]~[317]-~-!Pkkingdom! -~- [Release]~[500+ Download's]~!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll84/zakiman/hannahserverbaner.png[/img] [B]Server Name:[/B] [U]Pkkingdom[/U] [B]Server Base:[/B] [U]HiyaScape[/U] (Dont Flame About this till you read on) [B]Client Base Is:[/B] [U]Bluur's.[/U]
Please Do [b][u]Not[/u][/b] Flame Me, I [b]Only[/b] want Advice on how to improve, [u][b]Not[/b][/u] Put Down's.
[B][U]Link's[/U][/B] [U]Client:[/U] http://uppit.com/v/HI5V1209 [U]Server:[/U] http://uppit.com/v/OQ6L1RGZ Both Are Open. No Anti Leech, I Dont mind If you leech this aslong as you give me little credits.
Pkkingdom, My Goal Was to make An older server, Why? I Miss the old server's, Where it was Acctually "Fun" Not with the 4 day training to be able to pk, Then lose and have to start again. I think The Main Problem With Hiyascape, Was the stability. I Have Made It More Stable. [b][U] What I did:[/U][/b]
-Cleaned Server, Halfed The Size.
-Fixed All Bug's I know of From Hiyascape, Including a few dupe method's.
-Removed Prayer Draining, Lag's Server, No Need.
-Removed All Npc speech's that were above their head, For example, "General store trade me!" Lag's Server, No need for it.
-Made It More Stable, (View Picture's)
-Fixed Most Of The Special Attack's.
-Put Right Requirement's On most Item's I could think of.
-Moved Home, A More Convienant Place. When Leaving the lumbridge castle gate, It will become A Pk area.
-Corrected Alot Of The item bonus's And Price's
-Added A Server Automessedge, You Can Change this, Or remove it.
-Shop's Are Easier to find.
-Has, Chatlog's, Warning's, Rep Log's, Yell Log's, Trade Log's So you can track everything that happen's, Easier to find rulebraker's.
-Removed Alot of the Portal's, Kept a few.
-Removed The Login Welcome Screen, The purple one with the latest Update, Owner on etc, I made a new login messedge, Witch is the Rule's.
-Added Npc Dialogue's
-Added Perfect Dragon Claw Spec, (Hit's 4 time's, All hit's Deal Damage)
-Got Rid Of Slayer Chest's Now Working Slayer, Kill Npc's For slayer xp. [b][U] Client Has The following:[/U][/b]
-Working Orb's, Run, Prayer & hitpoint.
-Working Top Right Corner Door Logout
-Their Are Only a few custom's, Some people Like, Some People dont, So i went into the middle, Their is only, 3 custom cape's (DeathCape, Demonic Death cape, Heroic Cape, Personally I like them) Dragon Claw's, And Full void (Not added into server, Go to class 8 to find id's) if you do not want these item's Into the server, Just simply rmeove from the store's.
-Jframe, I have left all the Button's with no link's Attached, All yo uhave to do is go to Gui.Java and change these. Easy peezy.
-Welcome Bot.
-Got rid of all the un-Needed Model's, Client Load's fast. [b][U] Now For The Picture's.[/U]
LOGIN SCREEN: [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/9fumg4.jpg[/img] LOGIN MESSAGE'S: [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/152dpic.jpg[/img] WORKING ORB'S: (I have full hp their) [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2zhfujd.jpg[/img] NPC DIALGOGUE'S: [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/j5kuj7.jpg[/img] SHOP'S AND HOME: [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/mcey3o.jpg[/img] PORTAL'S: [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2ilq1.jpg[/img] THEIVING: [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/14kjeix.jpg[/img] THE CAPE'S, CLAW'S AND PLAYER'S: (STABILITY, HAVENT REACHED MAX YET) [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/xf721w.jpg[/img][/b]
[B][U]Link's[/U][/B] [U]Client:[/U] http://uppit.com/v/HI5V1209 [U]Server:[/U] http://uppit.com/v/OQ6L1RGZ
If your gonna use this, When making new area's you need to make them a safe area, Here's How to do it. [code]Open Source Folder > Open client.java
Search:
Quote public boolean nonWild() {
This is the area where you make the safe zones, you should also see many more codes underneath it which those are all safe zones. You dont really need to mess with those, now scroll all the way to the bottom of those codes and under the very last one you should see something like this..
|| (absX >= 3217 && absX <= 3233 && absY >= 3222 && absY <= 3212) This is a safe zone, so when you go into that area you cannot attack another player.
Now add underneath that:
|| (absX >= XXXX && absX <= xxxx && absY >= yyyy && absY <= YYYY) This is the base of making your safe zone, you should probably save this " base " somewhere.
Inserting the coordinates
Now, I will tell you how to make your coords, NOTE: this is pretty hard at first until you understand what i am saying. Dont just post random coords in those X's and Y's or else your safezone will not work.
Follow This: ( XXXX = north west (X co-ordinate) ( xxxx = north east (x co-ordinate) ( yyyy = south east (y co-ordinate) ( YYYY = north east (Y co-ordinate)
Now, the uppercase X's indicate the first X's that's in the " base " of the code. so go to the northwest of where you want your safe zone to end and ONLY insert the X coord's of that spot.
Now, go to the north east corner of where you want it to end, put the coord's of the x coord in the little x's. A shortcut is if you notice the uppercase Y's they also say north east. So you can also add the Y of that corner but in the UPPERCASE Y ONLY.
Now, go to the south east corner and insert ONLY the y coord in the lower case y's.
Now save your work ( file > save ) and then compile your source. Now once you run your server, and go to that area, you should notice its a safe zone and other players cannot attack you!
Tell me if you get any errors and i will try to help you as best as i can. [/code]
The Client's Ip Is set to 127.0.0.1 This is localhost, Change this Ip to whatever you want, Its found in, gui.java.
To Make your self Owner, Open Server file's, Open Character's, Open Your Playername, It should say somthing like, Player-rights = 0, Change the 0 to a 3, 0 = Normal, 1 = Mod, 2 = Admin, 3 = Owner, 4 = Hidden Staff.
If This is a Success, Ill amke a V2 Will be So much better.
Please Vote! If I make A V2, I will trt to add: -Rename All shop Keeper's, Instead of "Ghost Shop keeper" It will be, Talk to Pure Shop or w.e -Finish the rest of the item requirement's. -Make A new minigame. -Add a Buy X -Runescape Rightclick -Add Every Npc same as rs in, Lumbridge, Falador, Camelot & Varrock -And other stuff.
Please Enjoy, If you read This Or download, Please post, No flaming Please, Only Advice on how to improve :) If you sue this or anything within, Please Give me little credits.
[b]Current Download's:[/b] 500+,
[B][U]Link's[/U][/B] [U]Client:[/U] http://uppit.com/v/HI5V1209 [U]Server:[/U] http://uppit.com/v/OQ6L1RGZ
[u]Credit's[/u]: D D 3 - Hiyascape Paradise - Bluur's Client. Tutorial's Zm4 - gfx Help Moparscape Community - Support.
~Hannah <3

item.title: !~[1St Release]~[317]-~-!Pkkingdom! -~- [Release]~[500+ Download's]~!

item.description:
@Fission wrote:

If you need any help, feel free to PM me also. I suck at error solving, but I will do what I can.

What I would recommend:
Clean a tad-bit more, or alot, make it nice.
Package it into at least a Bin (Classfiles, savedgames etc) and Java/src folder.
Also, donâ€™t place all the NPCâ€™s or shops, etc in one place. Place them all over, neatly. Have areas instead of like portals, etc.
